segments.text: White Rose Restaurant . Good afternoon ! Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like to book a table for six for the next Monday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , sir . At what time should we expect you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what is it going to be , Chinese food or Western food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have your name , sir , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please book it under the name of Mr . Peter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So it's Mr . Peter , a table for six for the evening of the next Monday . It is Chinese food and you are coming at 6:30 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for calling us . We'll be expecting you next Monday .
segments.speaker: S1
